name: 胡同來
objective:
本課程重點在使博士班學生確實瞭解科學研究本質、量化研究方法、研究論文題目選擇、衡量程序與工具、文獻探討、問卷設計、資料收集與分析、論文撰寫方法，且在進行管理諮詢，如何選用合宜研究方法，並取得正確資訊，使目的完成。
The Special Topics in Research Methodology for Ph.D. students, includes the following topics: The nature of Science Research, Quantative Research Methods? And the research topic selection, literature survey, methodology and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.
schedule:
1.　　Frame of Research Methods
2.　　Quantative Research(I)
3.　　Quantative(II)
4.　　Theory Construction
5.　　Research Problem and Hypothesis
6.　　Constructs, Variables and Definitions
7.　　Measurement Theory and Scaling Methods(I)
8.　　Measurement Theory and Scaling Methods(II)
9.　　Middle Paper Presentation
10.　　Research Design (I)
11.　　Research Design (II)
12.　　Survey Research (I)
13.　　Survey Research (II)
14.　　Data Analysis (I)
15.　　Data Analysis (II)
16.　　Inferences and Interpretations
17.　　Ethics in Social Science Research
18.  Term Paper presentation
 (在課程進行中，日程安排可能會隨教授時間與授課內容變動適當調整)

1.     課堂出席 20 %
2.　　課堂參與 40% 
3.　　期中作業 20%
4.　　期末考試 20%
